sense.gloss: to go, to move (towards), to head (towards), to leave (for)
to move through, to travel across, to walk along (e.g. a road)
to go (well, badly, etc.), to proceed, to turn out, to get along
to do (in a particular way), to go (with; a choice), to try
to pass (of time, seasons, etc.), to go by
to stream, to flow
to die, to pass away
to reach (a stage, extent, age, etc.), to get to, to go (so far as ...)
to reach (of information, instructions, wind, etc.), to arrive
to continue ..., to go on ..., to (progress) steadily, to gradually ..., to progressively ...
to have an orgasm, to come, to cum
to trip, to get high, to have a drug-induced hallucination
action, conduct, behaviour, behavior, mobilization, mobilisation
the way there, outbound leg, outbound trip, departing leg
bound for ...
outbound ticket
to perform, to do, to conduct oneself, to carry out
travel, trip, journey, excursion, tour
administration, governance, the authorities, authority
act, deed, conduct
bank, banking institution
publication (of a newspaper, magazine, book, etc.), issue
issue (of banknotes, bonds, passport, etc.)
raising (an event)
execution (e.g. of a plan), carrying out, practice, action, implementation, fulfillment, realization

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓き↑過↑↓す↓ぎたものであっても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えをなくしたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓へ↑行↑↓い↓けたらいいのに。
sdata.e: I wish I could go to Japan.

sdata.j: いつかフランスに↑行↑↓い↓くことは↑避↑↓さ↓けられない、それがいつかは↑分↑↓わ↓からないけれど。
sdata.e: It is inevitable that I go to France someday, I just don't know when.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はそんなに↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓↑好↑↓す↓きではない。
sdata.e: I am not much of a traveller.

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓してくれる↑人↑↓ひと↓がいないんだ。
sdata.e: I don't have anyone who'd travel with me.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちがそこへ↑行↑↓い↓くかどうかを↑決↑↓き↓めるのは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓だ。
sdata.e: It is up to you to decide whether we will go there or not.

sdata.j: ここから↑遠↑↓とお↓くまで↑行↑↓い↓けるボートが↑欲↑↓ほ↓しいです。
sdata.e: I want a boat that will take me far away from here.

sdata.j: 「どうして↑行↑↓い↓かないの？」「↑行↑↓い↓きたくないからだよ」
sdata.e: Why aren't you going? "Because I don't want to."

words.gloss: to go, to move (towards), to head (towards), to leave (for)
action, conduct, behaviour, behavior, mobilization, mobilisation
the way there, outbound leg, outbound trip, departing leg
